query:
INSERT INTO file_tags (file_id, tag_id, added_by)
            SELECT DISTINCT
                f.id,
                $1::bigint,
                'sequential_tagger'
            FROM files f
            WHERE (
                LOWER(f.filename) LIKE '%' || LOWER($2) || '%'
                OR LOWER(f.filepath) LIKE '%' || LOWER($2) || '%'
            )
            ON CONFLICT (file_id, tag_id) DO NOTHING
